com.facebook.accountkit

Class Tracker

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.facebook.accountkit.Tracker
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    AccessTokenTracker, EmailLoginTracker, PhoneLoginTracker

    public abstract class Tracker
extends java.lang.Object
    Tracks broadcasts about changes in the state

    • Method Detail

      • startTracking

        public void startTracking()
        Starts tracking the state

      • stopTracking

        public void stopTracking()
        Stops tracking the state

      • pauseTracking

        public void pauseTracking()
        Pauses tracking the state The state changes will be enqueued and then flushed out after the next call to startTracking.

      • isPaused

        public boolean isPaused()
        Gets whether the tracker is paused
        Returns:
        true if the tracker is paused, false if not

      • isTracking

        public boolean isTracking()
        Gets whether the tracker is tracking the state
        Returns:
        true if the tracker is tracking the state, false if not

      • getActionStateChanged

        protected abstract java.lang.String getActionStateChanged()
        Returns:
        the action associated with the state change for the given tracker

      • isLocal

        protected boolean isLocal()
        Specified whether the broadcasts are local. When true, this class will receive broadcasts from the LocalBroadcastManager, otherwise from the application context. Returns true by default.
        Returns:
        boolean value specifying whether the broadcast is a local broadcast

      • onReceive

        protected abstract void onReceive(android.content.Intent intent)
        Called when the broadcast is received.
        Parameters:
        intent - the intent that was broadcast
